item.description:
Meet at 12 in the parking lot of Barbara's Bike Shop, which is at the trail head.

We will cycle 10 miles along the trail and stop at Cobie's clamshack. This is adjacent Nickerson State Park, so we can make a stop at the beach, too. We should be back at the starting point by 4 or 5 o'clock. Total cycling time should be about 2 hours at a moderate pace.

You can come just on Sat for the ride, or spend the weekend on the cape. I will be staying on the cape camping for 3 days at the North of Highland campground, which is out near the end of the cape. Please reserve a site if you would like to join me for camping. I can also have a second tent on my site. Some people have indicated that they would like to stay at a hotel. Either way, we can make plans to spend some time together on Saturday after the ride and on Sunday too.

http://www.cobies.com...

Rail Trail website and map at:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

http://www.capecodcam...
(508)487-1191
item.name: Cape Cod Rail Trail
